name: Phase II - Radiotron - Daniel Savio
description:
A game spawned out of Daniel Savios track "RADIOTRON" from the Album "Phase II"

Released on the label "Flora & Fauna"

Guns blazing

Classic Shoot-em-up action

Game developed by Nilski

Get the LP-album here:
https://floraochfauna.org/catalogue/phase_ii/
https://floraochfauna.org/news/radiotron/
